actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize certain grants for assisting in improved operation of waste treatment plants.

summary.text: Authorizes to be appropriated for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1973 and for each of the next two succeeding fiscal years, $25,000,000 per fiscal year for assisting in improved operation of waste treatment plants under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act. (Adds 33 U.S.C. 1156(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize certain grants for assisting in improved operation of waste treatment plants.
